name: FindSimilarLinks
description:
Find similar links based on a provided link.

Use this tool to find and retrieve links that are similar to a given link. Optionally, the contents of these similar links can also be obtained.

parameters.name: link_request_body
parameters.description: JSON containing the link to search for similar links. Include additional options if needed.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the exa_search API.
